compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Business expenses related to workers completing their job will usually be tax exempt

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: Global People s.r.l., GoGlobal Consulting S.r.l
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: All expense that has been approved by the client as a business expense will be NET to the employee (grossed up if not tax free)

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: Global People s.r.l., GoGlobal Consulting S.r.l
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Meals offered to a client/supplier is labeled as "spese di rappresentanza" (entertainment expenses) and is tax free up to 75% of the whole amount - remaining 25% is taxable

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: Global People s.r.l., GoGlobal Consulting S.r.l
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Maximum limit for mileage claim to be non-taxable is 15,000 Kilometers. Any excess kilometers will be subject to tax

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: Global People s.r.l., GoGlobal Consulting S.r.l
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Expenses linked to vehicles i.e. fuel, parking, toll charges, are tax exempt up to 20% of their costs as long as the car is not assigned to a specific employee. Fuel expenses are taxed. Transportation expenses are 100% tax exempt if worker provides evidence of transportation documents (not applicable for company cars)

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: Global People s.r.l., GoGlobal Consulting S.r.l
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Car Rental up to 15 days is tax exempt. Car Rental longer than 15 days will be subjected to taxes

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: Global People s.r.l., GoGlobal Consulting S.r.l
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Domestic: €46.48 per day tax-free (no hotel/meal provision), €30.99 per day (meals or hotels provided), €15.49 per day (both provided). Trips within municipal area: 75% tax exemption on per diem rate. International: €77.46 per day (no provision), €51.65 per day (meals or hotels provided), €25.82 per day (both provided). Long term trips over a month: allowance reduced by 10%

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Entertainment, Utilities, Professional services, Medical
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: All approved expenses will be paid as NET to the employee and grossed up if they are not tax-free
